name: Eilern
description: Updates fonts in the Ilern to be Comic Sans. Except in the Code editor, bc that would be too annoying.
css:
@-moz-document url-prefix("https://ilearn.ps.informatik.uni-kiel.de") {
html,
body,
div,
p,
form,
fieldset,
legend,
label,
button,
input,
select,
textarea,
h1,
h2,
h3,
h4,
h5,
h6,
a {
    font-family: "Comic Sans MS", cursive, sans-serif !important;
}
}
